title: Oregon Knifemakers List | BladeForums.com
text: - Joined - Apr 16, 2008 - Messages - 814 I'm just beginning but have noticed a lot of makers here. Is there a list? I'll list the ones I know of. I know there are a lot of manufactures here also but I'm interested in the custom hand made makers. Thanks in advance Mark Allen Jim- http://www.threesistersforge.com/ Ayres Brian- Portland Bell Michael- Chiloquin- http://dragonflyforge.com/ Behnke Mark - Central Point mbehnke1@charter.net Brandt Martin-Eugene area BuchananThad- Prineville http://www.buchananblades.com/contact.html Bugtei Pardy - Portland carter murray- www.cartercutlery.com/ clark nate- Drain http://www.youtube.com/user/nateclarkknives Cook Chuck- Dundee Coon Ray - gresham http://www.damascusknife.com/damascusknife.com/Welcome.html Crowner Jeff- Eugene area http://jeffreycrowner.webs.com/ Davis Terry Draven Eric- Medford www.Draven-industries.com Ford Swauger http://www.arizonacustomknives.com/artists/index.php?id=294 Fox Wendell- Eugene area Frank HH-Seal Rock Galyean Tim- http://www.galyeancustom.com/ Gamble Frank- Salem Unfortunately we lost Frank Gamble last year to cancer. I think he passed in Aug 2013. Goodard Wayne- www.goddardknives.com Haile G - TIGARD www.ghaileknives.com Harris Ted - ,Hillsboro Harsey Jr William- Creswell http://www.flying-cloud.com/harsey-knife/knife.html Horn Jess- Florence Huey Steve-Eugene area Jacobs Frank Kemp Michael-Eugene area Lake Ron-Eugene area http://www.crkt.com/ronlake Lum Bob- http://www.boblumknives.com/ Marcellia Nick Martin Gene - http://www.customknife.com/ Williams Magruder Jason- Talent www.Magruderknives.com Matthews Brett Moore Lynn- Eugene area Ochs Eric- http://www.ochssherworx.com/ Och Greg - Sherwood Olson Ole Darrold- Eugene area Perkerson Joel- Eugene area Pruyn Pete http://www.brothersvilleknife.com/ Richards A C "Chuck" www.woodchuckforge.com Richard Ray www.hawknknives.com Rider David- Eugene area Rydbom David- Ashland http://Kingdomarmory.com/ Sarganis Paul - Jacksonville http://www.sarganis.50megs.com/ Sheridan Luke - Bend Siebert Shane - Gladstone http://www.sibertknives.com/ Siegle Bill- http://www.siegleknives.com/blankpagestarter.html Smith Rick "Bear Bones" http://www.bearbone.com/ Sontag Carl- Eugene area Tendick Ben - Eugene B.R.T.
